title: These Madewell Ankle Boots Are on Super Sale at Nordstrom Right Now
text:
Photo: Courtesy of the vendor

It’s still a little too steamy for sweater weather, but fall is coming and soon it’ll be time to trade in your sandals for footwear that covers your toes. Enter these Madewell ankle boots, which come in either black or tan and have a comfortable stacked wooden heel and a side zipper for easy on-and-off. They’ll pair nicely with jeans and a chunky knit turtleneck when the time comes, but until then, they’ll also make a flowery, flow-y summer dress look a little more seasonally appropriate. And, right now, they are on super sale at Nordstrom — just $84, or 60 percent off the list price.
